dialogue:
[header name:Pessimistic Veteran]
Some widgets give you an 
[color value:blue]activated ability
[color value:blue].

[newpage wait:2]
[header name:Pessimistic Veteran]
You can toggle them [color value:blue]with W
[color value:regular] and use them 
[color value:blue]with S[color value:regular]. 

[newpage wait:2]
[header name:Pessimistic Veteran]
Remember that if your [color value:blue]Focus
[color value:regular] runs out, you'll lose 
all active widgets!
name: Veteran 2
